title: ClientSettings
description: User settings stored at .mcp-client-data/settings.yaml. Controls timeouts, iteration limits, and approval mode.

mcpTimeout.description: MCP tool call timeout in seconds. -1 for unlimited.

maxIterations.description: Maximum iterations between agent calls. -1 for unlimited.

hilEnabled.description: Human-in-the-loop mode: require approval before each tool execution

approveAll.description: Auto-approve all tools without prompting. Persists across sessions.

thinkingEnabled.description: Enable thinking/reasoning mode for supported models. When enabled, models produce visible chain-of-thought before responding.

thinkingLevel.description: Thinking budget level. Anthropic: 'small' (~5K tokens), 'medium' (~10K), 'large' (~25K). OpenAI/xAI: 'low', 'medium', 'high' reasoning_effort. Ollama: not applicable.
